posts.post_content: I am specifically Looking for the T205 Clarke AB backed, Evers T205 Cycle back, Reulbach T205 AB backed, and any well any other AB and Cycle T205's.  Please send me an email with scans and prices to [url]pup6913@hotmail.com[/url].  If you are open to offers I will make MY best offer.  Hope to hear back soon.
anyone know where these cards reside. Also looking for a Cobb AB in grade 4 as well as the elusive AB Matty in a 4+
I listed 2 broadleaf and a cycle on ebay.  Auctions begin tonight.
